about_the_game:
One of set of each SP version card.

[INCLUDED]
- D-BT04/SP01 Vairina Esperaridea
- D-BT04/SP02 Chakrabarthi True Dragon, Mahar Nirvana
- D-BT04/SP03 Trickmoon
- D-BT04/SP04 Diabolos, "Unrivaled" Bruce
- D-BT04/SP05 Desire Devil, Bubetsuu
- D-BT04/SP06 Brainwash Swirler
- D-BT04/SP07 Aurora Fierce Princess, Seraph Purelight
- D-BT04/SP08 Cardinal Draco, Masurea
- D-BT04/SP09 Gravidia Bacubirito
- D-BT04/SP10 Apex-surpassing Sword, Bastion Prime
- D-BT04/SP11 Heavenly Pike of Solicitation, Cornvoc
- D-BT04/SP12 Recurring Magic, Lalarita
- D-BT04/SP13 Sylvan Horned Beast Emperor, Magnolia Elder
- D-BT04/SP14 Blue Artillery Dragon, Inlet Pulse Dragon
- D-BT04/SP15 Roaming Prison Dragon
- D-BT04/SP16 Sealed Blaze Dragon, Adarla
- D-BT04/SP17 Twin Bullet of Dust Storm, Travis
- D-BT04/SP18 Sealed Blaze Spear, Aadhitya
- D-BT04/SP19 Desire Devil, Kenen
- D-BT04/SP20 Cutting Sword Dance, Qiehgra
- D-BT04/SP21 Diabolos Striker, Lyle
- D-BT04/SP22 Cardinal Draco, Culjameed
- D-BT04/SP23 Gravidia Shergo
- D-BT04/SP24 Aurora Battle Princess, Suppress Gleamer
- D-BT04/SP25 Twinned Great Magic, Totohne
- D-BT04/SP26 Heavenly Arrow of Sure-hit, Sparare
- D-BT04/SP27 Armor Piercing Knight, Mugain
- D-BT04/SP28 Sylvan Horned Beast, Panthero
- D-BT04/SP29 Clipping Dragon of Soul-revolution
- D-BT04/SP30 Gather Upon Me, Ye Wandering Souls
- D-BT04/SP31 Flare Veil Dragon
- D-BT04/SP32 Rouse Wildmaster, Riley
- D-BT04/SP33 Ameliorate Connector
- D-BT04/SP34 Protection Magic, Prorobi
- D-BT04/SP35 Serene Maiden, Lena
- D-BT04/SP36 Sealed Blaze Maiden, Bavsargra
- D-BT04/SP37 Sealed Blaze Dragon, Halibadra
- D-BT04/SP38 Sealed Blaze Dragon, Namorkahr
- D-BT04/SP39 Sealed Blaze Dragon, Arhinsa
- D-BT04/SP40 Sealed Blaze Sword, Prithivih
- D-BT04/SP41 Sealed Blaze Shield, Swayanbuh
- D-BT04/SP42 Sealed Blaze Gun, Chandra
- D-BT04/SP43 Falling Hellhazard
- D-BT04/SP44 Vairina
- D-BT04/SP45 Hellblast Full Dive
- D-BT04/SP46 Bizarre Beast, Bagumotor
- D-BT04/SP47 Shadow Army
- D-BT04/SP48 Form up, O Chosen Knights
- D-BT04/SP49 Sylvan Horned Beast, Koocy
- D-BT04/SP50 Spiritual Body Condensation

**If you already own the maximum number of cards allowed in-game that are also included in this set, you will receive a worthy amount of CP (in-game material for card crafting) instead.
**This set is also included in the "Rare Card Set 01 - 09".
**It is possible to purchase both individual Rare Card Sets and the bundle, but the acquisition of SP cards will only be reflected once.
**Please be careful not to purchases a Rare Card Sets twice.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows8.1
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD processor, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 16 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows8.1
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7-3770
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 16 GB available space
